name: joomlahunterlinks
description: Logs all the links that are on the site, and if the links are blacklisted then deletes them

scripts.github: npm run update && git add --all  && git commit -m "New version %npm_package_version%. Read more https://github.com/xdan/joomlahunterlinks#%npm_package_version% " && git tag %npm_package_version% && git push --tags origin HEAD:master

author: Chupurnov Valeriy
